                        Item arg1)
        Description copied from interface: ItemManager
        Returns if the item of type I contains the location
        Specified by:
        contains in interface ItemManager<Item>
        Parameters:
        arg0 - a Point2D which one want to know if it is contained in the item
        arg1 - an I in which the location may or not be contained
        Returns:
        true if item contains location; false otherwise
